Name: Investigation Merits
Desc: Used for purchasing valuable items in Association Supplies.
Desc2: Hollows are practical disasters, and won't become any less dangerous due to your rank, social status, or wealth. Survival depends on skill (and luck). That's why the Hollow Investigative Association's Investigator assessments are also practical. So long as you can complete a dangerous Investigation mission, you can obtain merits and with merits, you'll naturally be able to obtain rewards.
